events.message: I received the wrong size for my recent order, and I would like to request a refund because the item does not fit at all.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request to return the item and receive money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Michael for handling the refund request related to the wrong item size.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the wrong size item.
Could you please provide us with the order number and a photo of the item to verify the size issue and start the refund process?
Sure, the order number is 987654321, and I have attached a clear picture showing the label indicating the incorrect size.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately, and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help in resolving this issue smoothly and look forward to receiving the refund.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to be credited back to your original payment method.
We are checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, I have received the refund in my bank account. Thank you for your excellent support throughout this process.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience to help us improve our service.
I completed the survey and rated the service as excellent. The support team was very helpful and responsive.
The refund case has been closed successfully following the customer's confirmation and completed survey feedback.
This case has been archived in the system for record-keeping and future reference as it is now fully resolved and closed.
